entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 08:26 AM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:26 AM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023
